form.titleEn: Grant Application for Funding – Supporting Black Canadian Communities (SBCC) Initiative
form.titleFr: Demande de financement de subvention - Initiative pour appuyer les communautés noires du Canada (ACNC)

properties.titleFr: Initiative pour appuyer les communautés noires du Canada
properties.descriptionEn: The program provides capital assistance to Black organizations in Canada to build capacity to better fulfill their missions and better serve Black communities in Canada.
properties.descriptionFr: Le programme fournit du financement aux immobilisations des organismes desservant des personnes noires au Canada pour accroître leur capacité de manière à mieux remplir leurs missions et de mieux servir les communautés noires au Canada.

choices.en: Equipment purchase for work or community space
choices.fr: Achat d’équipement pour un espace de travail ou communautaire

choices.en: Renovation or retrofit of an existing workspace or community space
choices.fr: Rénovation ou réaménagement d’un espace de travail ou d’un espace communautaire existant pour en améliorer la fonctionnalité

choices.en: Both equipment purchase and renovation or retrofit
choices.fr: Achat d’équipement et activité de rénovation ou de réaménagement

properties.description: (Organization's full name, as it appears on legal documents)
For example: Sector councils; University; Municipal Government; etc. (see Applicant Guide for more examples)

properties.titleFr: Numéro d’entreprise de l’Agence du revenu du Canada (ARC)
properties.description: (Unique 15-digit number that is assigned to your business or legal entity by CRA)

properties.descriptionEn: If you do not have a CRA Business Number, provide one of the following:
properties.descriptionFr: Si vous ne possédez pas de numéro d’entreprise de l’ARC, veuillez fournir un des numéros suivants :

properties.descriptionEn: For example: Your provincial/territorial corporation number (i.e. number found on your Letters Patent) or your federal corporation number with Industry Canada (see Applicant Guide for further details).
properties.descriptionFr: Par exemple : Votre numéro d’entreprise provincial ou territorial (c.-à-d. le numéro qui se trouve dans vos lettres patentes) ou votre numéro d’entreprise fédéral auprès d’Industrie Canada (voir le Guide du demandeur pour en savoir plus).

choices.en: I have provided a separate document confirming the proof of operations for my organization.
choices.fr: J’ai fourni un document d’appui confirmant la preuve des activités de mon organisme.

properties.titleFr: spécifier le documentation ou numéro d’entreprise
Numéro de téléphone et de poste

properties.titleEn: Is your mailing address the same as the Organization Primary Address?
properties.titleFr: Votre adresse postale est-elle la même que l'adresse principale de l'organisation?

properties.titleEn: Select the target group(s) that best aligns with your organization’s primary activities
properties.titleFr: Sélectionnez le ou les groupes cibles qui cadrent le mieux avec les activités principales de votre organisme

choices.fr: Collectivités de langue officielle en situation minoritaire

properties.titleFr: Si vous avez sélectionné «autre», veuillez préciser

properties.descriptionEn: This should be your primary contact person with respect to this application for funding.
properties.descriptionFr: Il s’agira de votre principale personne-ressource en ce qui a trait à la présente demande de financement.

choices.fr: Même que l’adresse principale de l’organisme

choices.en: Same as Organization Primary Mailing Address
choices.fr: Même que l’adresse postale de l’organisme

properties.descriptionEn: This should be your secondary contact person with respect to this application for funding in case we cannot reach the primary contact.
properties.descriptionFr: Il s’agira de votre deuxième personne-ressource en ce qui a trait à la présente demande de financement au cas où nous ne pouvons pas joindre la personne-ressource principale.

choices.fr: Même que l’adresse principale de l’organisme

choices.en: Same as Organization Primary Mailing Address
choices.fr: Même que l’adresse postale de l’organisme

properties.titleEn: Does your organization owe any amounts of to the Government of Canada?
properties.titleFr: Est-ce que votre organisme doit des sommes au gouvernement du Canada?

properties.descriptionEn: If yes, complete the fields below for each amount owing.
properties.descriptionFr: Si oui, veuillez remplir les champs ci-dessous pour chaque somme due.

properties.titleEn: Nature of the amount owing (e.g. taxes, penalties, overpayments)
properties.titleFr: Nature de la somme due (p. ex., impôts, pénalités, trop payés)

properties.titleEn: Department or agency to which amount is owed
properties.titleFr: Ministère ou organisme auquel la somme en souffrance est due

properties.titleFr: Si une somme est due, une entente de paiement a-t-elle été conclue?

properties.titleEn: Amount requested from Employment and Social Development Canada
What does your project aim to achieve

properties.descriptionEn: (Provide the activities and their timelines that will be taking place as part of this proposed project.)

properties.titleEn: Will any of the proposed project activities be delivered at your organization’s primary address?
Will any of the proposed project activities be delivered in a different location from your organization’s primary address?
Will the project or any of its activities involve or benefit people in English or French linguistic minority communities in Canada, in some way?
Is your project targeting vulnerable groups?
If yes, select the specific target group(s) that applies to your project.

choices.fr: Collectivités de langue officielle en situation minoritaire

properties.titleEn: Will your project target indiginous peoples?

properties.titleFr: Si vous avez sélectionné «autre», veuillez préciser

properties.descriptionEn: (expenses) for the eligible activities or services of the proposed object
List each eligible activity or service:
(revenues) for the proposed project costs noted above
List Organization Name for each Funding Source (can be other governments, a private sector organization, or self-funded)

properties.titleEn: Use this field to provide any further budget details that you may find necessary in describing your project.
Select the origins of the Black Canadian communities in Canada your organization serves.

choices.en: African origins, including, Eastern, Central, Western and Southern

properties.titleEn: Please provide a digital picture of the workspace or community space to be improved

choices.en: I have provided a digital picture of the workspace or community space I want to improve, if my project is for a renovation.
I attest that the organization is Black-led (i.e. has Black leadership at all levels of management)
I attest I am the owner of a building
I attest that I have a lease and written approval of building owner to undertake the project
I attest that the project is not located on Government of Canada property, nor in a private home or dwelling.
I  provided one external estimate if my project is for renovation of an existing space.
I will attest to the contents in Section C – Part 5 of this application form

properties.descriptionEn: n order for your application to be eligible, an official representative who has the capacity and the authority to submit project proposals and enter into contracts and agreements on behalf of your organization must attest to the following:

choices.en: I have the capacity and the authority to submit this Application for Funding on behalf of the applicant organization.

I certify and warrant on behalf of the organization and in my personal capacity that the information provided in this Application for Funding and any supporting documentation is true, accurate, and complete.
I have read the Applicant Guide and understand the program’s requirements.
